title: Academics
script: Are classes a little overwhelming? Have stories or questions on how to succeed? Find support here.

title: Gratitude
script: What are your highlights? Who or what are you grateful for? Write it for yourself or share with others.

title: Creativity
script: How do you de-stress? Photos, poetry, sketches, music? Share your work and discuss art here.

title: Depression
script: How do you handle depression or sadness? How do you help others? You're not alone in this.

title: POC + Wellness
script: Are you a person of color? Share your experiences, questions, and tips to lift each other up.

title: Anxiety
script: This space is dedicated to discussing and supporting our experiences with anxiety.

title: Animals + Nature
script: Guess what? Animals and nature have a positive effect on our psyche. Bet you already knew that.

title: FLI + Wellness
script: First-gen or low income (FLI)? Need to talk about class? Connect and realize the power in your community.

title: LGBTQ + Wellness
script: Identify along the LGBTQ+ spectrum? Share your experiences, questions, and tips to support each other.

title: Relationships
script: Where do we begin? If you need to discuss home, family, partners, etc., you already know this is the space.

title: Grief
script: Experiencing the loss of someone or something? Healing takes time. Feel free to process your thoughts here.

title: Eating + Wellness
script: A place to share experiences and support on topics ranging from eating habits to eating disorders.
